name: AppcircleEnterpriseStore
description: Efficiently publish your apps to Appcircle Enterprise Store.
author: appcircle

inputs.name: accessToken
inputs.label: Appcircle Personal API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Appcircle Personal API Token to authenticate connections to Appcircle services. This token allows your Azure DevOps pipeline to interact with Appcircle for distributing applications.

inputs.name: entProfileId
inputs.label: Enterprise Profile Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Appcircle Enterprise App Store Mobile Profile ID to specify the profile to be used for the publishment. This ID can be found in the Enterprise App Store Mobile module dashboard.

inputs.name: appPath
inputs.label: App Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to your application file. For iOS, this can be a .ipa. For Android, specify the .apk or .appbundle file path.
